channel.title: You have been told some fantastic lies
channel.description:
http://www.cnn.com/2006/LAW/05/15/duke.rapecase/index.html
The Duke Lacrosse teams season ended early this year, because of one stupid bitch. If your an exotic dancer, and you hire yourself out to rich, white, frat boys, you damn well better expect to be giving some pussy. If you're not, you're retarded and the court case should be switched to a "Taking advantage of the disabled" type charge. Bottom line, who gives a fuck about either the rich frat boys or the stupid bitch, and why are they in the news?

item.title: You have been told some fantastic lies
item.dc:creator: @doomsday doomsday
item.description:
@doomsday wrote:

[quote=“yna_ajhear5, post:17, topic:2899”]The case realy doesn’t add up.
I mean… the DNA doesn’t match.
Onw of the guys was at a bank when the “crime” happened.
I think that she just wants more money from the white SOBs. She KNOWS there rich, and if she loses, she’ll say it’s a hate crime.

…America.[/quote]

yeah, everyone loves america

and if you dont… i know where you live…

note please dont go all defensive and be like oh yeah where do i live?, im just trying to threaten you here, cant you respect that?

Read full topic

item.title: You have been told some fantastic lies
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

I just hate liars.

Pittman referred to the accuser's report that she had been sexually assaulted as a "crock," the investigator wrote, and "she also stated that she was with her the whole time until she left," except for five minutes -- not the 30 minutes reported by the alleged victim, according to court documents.
"Precious became 'crazy' and eventually passed out and had to be carried to Pittman's car by some of the Duke athletes," the statement says.
The accuser also told police that she used a vibrating sex toy during a dance in a hotel room for a male and female, but she told police that she had not had sex in the week before the party, the note says.

However, a male friend of the accuser said that he had sex with her that week and that he drove her to three other sexual encounters, according to the friend’s statement.


http://www.cnn.com/2006/LAW/06/08/duke.lacrosse/index.html

Read full topic

item.title: You have been told some fantastic lies
item.dc:creator: @Arkanor Arkanor
item.description:
@Arkanor wrote:

[quote=“PaulT, post:1, topic:2899”]http://www.cnn.com/2006/LAW/05/15/duke.rapecase/index.html

The Duke Lacrosse teams season ended early this year, because of one stupid bitch. If your an exotic dancer, and you hire yourself out to rich, white, frat boys, you damn well better expect to be giving some pussy. If you’re not, you’re retarded and the court case should be switched to a “Taking advantage of the disabled” type charge. Bottom line, who gives a fuck about either the rich frat boys or the stupid bitch, and why are they in the news?[/quote]

I saw that, and immediately I thought “What a bitch.”

Mind, [real rape cases evoke pity from me. A stripper who for some reason wanted to frak up the lives of the lives of the lacrosse team, however, elicits scorn and antipathy.

Read full topic
item.source: You have been told some fantastic lies

item.title: You have been told some fantastic lies
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Anyhow: Knowing strippers as I so-intimately-do, she was probably just fine with sleeping with them, if only they drop another few hundred. Knowing drunken frat boys as I so-intimately-do, they probably raped her for the sheer joy of it, nonetheless. I don't care what you do for a living, or how utterly retarded you are, no one deserves to be gang raped. Suggesting that someone who was raped brought it upon themselves makes me think you might be just a tad bit fuggin demented.

Any stripper who agrees to preform for the Duke Lacrosse team and co. knows very well what they’re getting into. I call her a dumb bitch, because anyone who is stripping for the Duke Lacrosse team is a really dumb bitch anyway, regardless of whether she got raped or not. And if they don’t, they are obviously too challenged to be in that kind of work. Also, I don’t think she was raped; she dropped her case in court, one of the people she was accusing was shown on a video from a camera at an ATM machine at the timewhen he was supposed to be raping her, and basically her whole story was sketchy in my opinion. The constitution of the US says the Lacrosse team is innocent untill proven guilty in a court of law, which means they didn’t rape her, I love America.

Read full topic
item.source: You have been told some fantastic lies

item.title: You have been told some fantastic lies
item.dc:creator: @philodespotos philodespotos
item.description:
@philodespotos wrote:

PaulT:

The Duke Lacrosse teams season ended early this year, because of one stupid bitch. If your an exotic dancer, and you hire yourself out to rich, white, frat boys, you damn well better expect to be giving some pussy. If you’re not, you’re retarded and the court case should be switched to a “Taking advantage of the disabled” type charge. Bottom line, who gives a fuck about either the rich frat boys or the stupid bitch, and why are they in the news?

They’re in the news because it’s sensational and devoid of content, which is precisely what American media is most fond of.

Anyhow: Knowing strippers as I so-intimately-do, she was probably just fine with sleeping with them, if only they drop another few hundred. Knowing drunken frat boys as I so-intimately-do, they probably raped her for the sheer joy of it, nonetheless. I don’t care what you do for a living, or how utterly retarded you are, no one deserves to be gang raped. Suggesting that someone who was raped brought it upon themselves makes me think you might be just a tad bit fuggin demented.

Read full topic
